name: TGI Justice Project
description: Free reentry support, advocacy, and community resources for trans/intersex individuals
fullDescription: TGI Justice Project supports transgender and intersex people who are currently or formerly incarcerated, providing reentry services, advocacy, and community support.
whatTheyOffer:
- Reentry support services
- Advocacy for incarcerated trans/intersex people
- Housing assistance
- Legal name/gender marker changes
- Community organizing
- Mutual aid support
howToGetIt:
1. Contact TGI Justice Project
2. Currently or formerly incarcerated trans/intersex individuals welcome
3. Receive reentry support
4. Access advocacy services
5. Join community programs
keywords: TGI Justice Project, TGIJP, transgender, intersex, incarcerated, reentry, formerly incarcerated, housing assistance, name change, gender marker, mutual aid
